definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Bigger isn't better, so skip the huge tomatoes and giant peppers.
sentences.chinese: 越大越差，因此不要选用那些大个西红柿和大个辣椒。

sentences.english: Tomato soup is my cup of tea.
sentences.chinese: 西红柿汤是我喜欢的东西。

sentences.english: People like, to cook tomatoes with eggs.
sentences.chinese: 人们喜欢用鸡蛋炒西红柿。

sentences.english: Slice up cucumbers and tomatoes and mix together with a cup of low-fat cottage cheese.
sentences.chinese: 切片黄瓜和西红柿，混合的和低脂松软干酪杯在一起。

sentences.english: How about we have a beef and tomato stew to start?
sentences.chinese: 我们先点个牛肉炖西红柿怎么样？

sentences.english: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.english: At the farmer's market I got tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, etm.
sentences.chinese: 我在农贸市场买了些西红柿，黄瓜，小萝卜等小东西。

sentences.english: Early in April, just before a rain begins, broadcast tomato seeds.
sentences.chinese: 四月初的头场雨前，要把西红柿种播子下。

sentences.english: All above come with lettuce, tomato, onion and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 以上均配有生菜，西红柿，洋葱和青瓜。

sentences.english: The tomatoes, half of which have gone bad, are in a basket.
sentences.chinese: 放在篮子里西红柿有一半已经烂掉了。

sentences.english: Tomato juice is promising in the anti-platelet therapy.
sentences.chinese: 西红柿汁具有潜在的抗血小板治疗前景。

sentences.english: As for beef, we Chinese would prefer it stewed with potatoes or tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 至于牛肉，中国人喜欢和西红柿和土豆一起炖。

sentences.english: She wants bread, meat, milk, sugar and.
sentences.chinese: 她要买面包，肉，牛奶，糖和西红柿。

sentences.english: Use the FRESH tomatoes and make sure the soup is THICK.
sentences.chinese: 主味西红柿，一定要新鲜，并烧至汤浓。

sentences.english: Leonard pottered round the greenhouse, tying up canes for the tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 伦纳德在温室里悠然自得地给西红柿绑上撑杆。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
